name: Internet City The Lucchese Crime War (DLC)
name_original: Internet City The Lucchese Crime War (DLC)
description:
After Keemstar lead the biggest heist in history known as the OpenSea Heist. The total taking was 200 Million dollars in Crypto. However every crooked Internet City Police officer knows it was Keemstar's gang that did it. Now he has hired hitmen Kenneth and Janie to take car of loose ends. However when a hacking job that Kenneth and Janie do goes south they near the gangs of Internet City into a all out war.

Development Story

This game never got to the development stage but this was cancelled DLC for the first Internet City game. It stayed in the writers stage for over 1 month before eventually being cancelled due to lack of motivation. The writer I partnered with named Janie Balderas finished it, however I never got around to developing it. Instead me and Janie worked on the story to a new IP called Chronicles of Burnet, however that project was also canned. I revived this project on 11/27/2022 for Newground's 3 Star Game Jam.

How to save and keep the save file on Mobile:

To save on Mobile devices download a 3rd party browser Chrome, Opera, Brave etc on your phone and play the game that way for some reason the default browser provided on your phone Safari/Google only save the game for a limited time but through Chrome the save is there in definite Note this has been tested on Private browsers Brave/Opera and works the same way More information about the game

Controls

PC:

Movement: Arrow keys, Num pad

Action: Z, Enter, Space or walk up to it

Cancel: X, Esc, Num pad 0

Menu: X, Esc, Num pad 0

Dash: Shift

Previous Page: Q, Page Up

Next Page: W, Page Down

Scroll Pages: Arrow Keys, Num pad

Xbox Controller:

Movement: D-Pad

Action: A

Cancel: B

Menu: Y

Dash: X

Previous Page: LB

Next Page: RB

Scroll Pages: D-Pad

Playstation Controller:

Movement: D-Pad

Action: X button

Cancel: Circle

Menu: Triangle

Dash: Square

Previous Page: L1

Next Page: R1

Scroll Pages: D-Pad

Mobile Controls:

Movement: Tap destination *2

Action: Tap target

Cancel: Tap with two fingers

Menu: Tap with two fingers

Dash: None

Previous Page: None

Next Page: None

Scroll Pages: Tap and hold as you swipe from inside of page to outside of page.

Mouse:

Movement: Click destination *2

Action: Click Target

Cancel: Right Click

Menu: Right Click

Dash: None

Previous Page: None

Next Page: None

Scroll Pages: Drag from inside of page to outside of page/mouse scroll wheel

Known Bugs and Fixes

Text load Bug: If the text in the game does not load then refresh the page and load from a auto save file.
